ROOT:
-- DaoOrder_Details_D5_SelCnt -- 2014/2/9 日立 太郎 SELECT COUNT(*) FROM [Order Details]
WHERE AND [OrderID] = @OrderIDAND [OrderID] IS NULL AND [OrderID] LIKE @OrderID_Like AND [ProductID] = @ProductIDAND [ProductID] IS NULL AND [ProductID] LIKE @ProductID_Like AND [UnitPrice] = @UnitPriceAND [UnitPrice] IS NULL AND [UnitPrice] LIKE @UnitPrice_Like AND [Quantity] = @QuantityAND [Quantity] IS NULL AND [Quantity] LIKE @Quantity_Like AND [Discount] = @DiscountAND [Discount] IS NULL AND [Discount] LIKE @Discount_Like
